venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
For our first meeting, we will start by getting to know each other, and talking about projects and plans for the year. Then we can discuss the current hot topics such as social network marketing.

Agenda

  • 07:30 - 07:45 Self Introduction, exchange business cards
  • 07:45 - 08:15 Discussion of ways and options of purchasing online ads - video ads, banner ads (case study presentation is welcome)
  • 08:15 - 08:45 Discussion of methods of social network marketing (case study presentation is welcome)
  • 08:45 - 09:15 Discussion of word-of-mouth marketing on the internet
  • 09:15 - open networking


If you would like to present a case study, let me know ahead of time. I do want to make sure that the presentation is valid and good use of everyone's time.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask a waiter for the function room in the back. Finding parking on the street is pretty easy around there. There are also two metered parking lots near the back of the venue.
item.why: You will love it because you will learn and meet new friends.

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Understanding Word-of-mouth Marketing and Social Network Marketing
